original_text: And they removed the burnt offerings, that they might give according to the divisions of the families of the people, to offer unto the Lord, as it is written in the book of Moses. And so did they with the oxen.
korean_text: 그 번제물을 옮겨 족속의 서열대로 모든 백성에게 나누어 모세의 책에 기록된 대로 여호와께 드리게 하고 소도 그와 같이 하고

sentences.original_text: that they might give according to divisions of families of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 사람들의 가족 구분에 따라 주기 위해

sentences.original_text: as it is written in the book of Moses
And so did they with the oxen
